content:
"Here are some recommended scenic spots for each day of your 7-day trip to Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province in China in the winter season, along with brief descriptions of their features and attractions that might interest your group of friends:

Day 1:

1. West Lake (Xi Hu) - While the winter temperatures can be chilly in Hangzhou, West Lake is still a must-visit attraction year-round. In the winter, the scenery takes on a peaceful and serene quality with the misty lake and snow-covered landscape. Your friends can take a leisurely walk around the lake, enjoy a hot cup of tea at a lakeside teahouse, or take a boat ride to take in the winter wonderland scenery.
2. Xixi National Wetland Park - The winter months can be a quieter time to visit Xixi National Wetland Park, but the peaceful atmosphere makes for a unique experience. The park's serene waterways and marshes take on a tranquil quality, and visitors can enjoy the migratory birds that flock to the park during the winter months. Your friends can explore the park's various trails and enjoy the peaceful winter scenery."
You should learn the contents above and outputs travel guide in this format. If you understand, reply "yes".
